mapper.select: select ho_test_request.HO_TEST_REQUEST_CODE, ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CODE, ho_patient.HO_PATIENT_NAME from ho_test_request join ho_treatment ON ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CODE = ho_test_request.HO_TREATMENT_CODE JOIN ho_patient ON ho_patient.HO_PATIENT_CODE = ho_treatment.HO_PATIENT_CODE where ho_test_request.HO_TEST_CODE=#{hoTestCode} AND ho_treatment.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE=#{hoHospitalCode}

select HO_TEST_REQUEST_CODE, ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CODE, ho_patient.HO_PATIENT_NAME, ho_test.HO_TEST_CODE, ho_test.HO_TEST_NAME from ho_test_request join ho_treatment ON ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CODE = ho_test_request.HO_TREATMENT_CODE JOIN ho_patient ON ho_patient.HO_PATIENT_CODE = ho_treatment.HO_PATIENT_CODE JOIN ho_test ON ho_test.HO_TEST_CODE = ho_test_request.HO_TEST_CODE WHERE ho_test_request.HO_TEST_REQUEST_CODE=#{hoTestRequestCode}
mapper.insert: insert into ho_media_test( HO_MEDIA_TEST_CODE, HO_TEST_REQUEST_CODE, HO_TREATMENT_CODE, HO_TEST_STATE_CODE, HO_MEDIA_TEST_DATE ) select if(HO_MEDIA_TEST_CODE is null, videoInspection_1, CONCAT('videoInspection_', max(cast(substring(HO_MEDIA_TEST_CODE,17,5) as UNSIGNED ))+1)), #{hoTestRequestCode}, #{hoTreatmentCode}, #{hoTestStateCode}, now() FROM ho_media_test
mapper.select: select HO_TEST_REQUEST_CODE, ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CODE, ho_patient.HO_PATIENT_NAME, ho_test.HO_TEST_CODE, ho_test.HO_TEST_NAME from ho_test_request join ho_treatment ON ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CODE = ho_test_request.HO_TREATMENT_CODE JOIN ho_patient ON ho_patient.HO_PATIENT_CODE = ho_treatment.HO_PATIENT_CODE JOIN ho_test ON ho_test.HO_TEST_CODE = ho_test_request.HO_TEST_CODE WHERE ho_test_request.HO_TEST_REQUEST_CODE=#{hoTestRequestCode}
mapper.insert: insert into ho_blood_test( HO_BLOOD_TEST_CODE, HO_TEST_REQUEST_CODE, HO_TREATMENT_CODE, HO_TEST_STATE_CODE, HO_BLOOD_TEST_DATE ) select if(not exists (select * from ho_blood_test), bloodInspection_1, CONCAT('bloodInspection_', max(cast(substring(HO_BLOOD_TEST_CODE,17,5) as UNSIGNED ))+1)), #{hoTestRequestCode}, #{hoTreatmentCode}, #{hoTestStateCode}, #{hoBloodTestPlate}, now() FROM ho_blood_test

insert into ho_test_request( HO_TEST_REQUEST_CODE, HO_TREATMENT_CODE, HO_TEST_CODE ) select if(not exists (select * from ho_test_request), 'testrequest_1', CONCAT('testrequest_', max(cast(substring(HO_TEST_REQUEST_CODE,13,5) as UNSIGNED ))+1)), #{hoTreatmentCode}, #{hoTestCode} from ho_test_request
mapper.update: update ho_blood_test INNER JOIN ho_treatment ON ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CODE = ho_blood_test.HO_TREATMENT_CODE INNER JOIN ho_hospital ON ho_hospital.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE = ho_treatment.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE set HO_TEST_STATE_CODE='3', HO_BLOOD_TEST_PLATELET=#{hoBloodTestPlatelet}, HO_BLOOD_TEST_SUGAR=#{hoBloodTestSugar}, HO_BLOOD_TEST_IMAGE_PATH=#{hoBloodTestImagePath}, HO_BLOOD_TEST_IMAGE_NAME=#{hoBloodTestImageName}, HO_BLOOD_TEST_REGISTRATION_DATE=now() where ho_hospital.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE=#{hoHospitalCode} AND HO_BLOOD_TEST_CODE=#{hoBloodTestCode}

update ho_media_test INNER JOIN ho_treatment ON ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CODE = ho_media_test.HO_TREATMENT_CODE INNER JOIN ho_hospital ON ho_hospital.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE = ho_treatment.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE set HO_TEST_STATE_CODE='3', HO_MEDIA_TEST_IMAGE_PATH=#{hoBloodTestImagePath}, HO_MEDIA_TEST_IMAGE_NAME=#{hoBloodTestImageName}, HO_MEDIA_TEST_REGISTRATION_DATE=now() where ho_hospital.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE=#{hoHospitalCode} AND HO_MEDIA_TEST_CODE=#{hoBloodTestCode}
